balanceOf(address).details: This balance includes any funds due to the user from market operations, such as fulfilled bids or asks.

params.user: The address of the user whose balance is being queried.

returns._0: The claimable balance of the user.

claimBalance().details: Reverts if the user has no claimable balance.

clearMarket(uint256).details: This function matches orders in price descending order and settles them.      Anyone can call this function to clear the market. However, the system does not currently reimburse the caller for gas expenses.      It is assumed that the market will either be operated by an entity that requires its operation, or the gas costs will be shared among the participants of the market.

params._eurcTokenAddress: The address of the EURC token contract used for bidding and settlements.

params.hour: The hour for which asks are being retrieved.
params.user: The address of the user whose asks are being retrieved.

returns._0: An array of Ask structs that were placed by the specified user for the specified hour.

params.hour: The hour for which asks are being retrieved.

returns._0: An array of Ask structs for the specified hour.

params.hour: The hour for which bids are being retrieved.
params.user: The address of the user whose bids are being retrieved.

returns._0: An array of Bid structs that were placed by the specified user for the specified hour.

params.hour: The hour for which bids are being retrieved.

returns._0: An array of Bid structs for the specified hour.

placeAsk(uint256,uint256).details: Requires that the ask amount is not zero and can only be placed for future hours not yet cleared.

params.amount: The amount of energy in kWh being offered.
params.hour: The market hour for which the ask is being placed.

placeBid(uint256,uint256,uint256).details: Requires that the bid price is above the minimum price and the bid amount is not zero.      Bids can only be placed for future hours not yet cleared.

params.amount: The amount of energy in kWh being bid for.
params.hour: The market hour for which the bid is being placed.
params.price: The price per kWh in EURC.

balanceOf(address).notice: Returns the claimable balance of a user.

claimBalance().notice: Allows users to claim any balance available to them from fulfilled bids or asks.

clearMarket(uint256).notice: Clears the market for a specific hour, matching bids and asks based on the determined clearing price.

getAsksByAddress(uint256,address).notice: Retrieves all asks placed by a specific user for a specific hour.

getAsksByHour(uint256).notice: Retrieves all asks placed for a specific hour.

getBidsByAddress(uint256,address).notice: Retrieves all bids placed by a specific user for a specific hour.

getBidsByHour(uint256).notice: Retrieves all bids placed for a specific hour.

placeAsk(uint256,uint256).notice: Places an ask for selling energy in a specific market hour.

placeBid(uint256,uint256,uint256).notice: Places a bid for energy in a specific market hour.
